LanguageData.PerformedInExtremelyImpressiveSpace.stag: I always dreamed I would perform somewhere like that
What an incredible place to perform
LanguageData.PerformedInImpressiveSpace.stages.0.desc: I enjoy performing in in that lovely environment

LanguageData.Performed.stages.0.description: I got to share my art with the world!
